name: The Unfortunate Office Dude
description:
You're the Unfortunate Office Dude. 

Just woke up in the office with no clothes.

Hide behind objects.

Stay out of sight of the other Office Dudes.

Get to the exit that's on the top floor.

You only have one life.

ARROWS LEFT, RIGHT = Move left  / right

ARROW UP = Use Door to get to the next level
